description.english: Win a round with burning damage as your top damage source
description.french: Gagnez une manche avec des dégâts de brûlure comme principale source de dégâts

description.spanish: Gana una ronda con daño por quemaduras como tu principal fuente de daño.

description.english: Win a round with poison damage as your top damage source

description.italian: Vinci un round con il danno da veleno come principale fonte di danno

description.koreana: 독 데미지를 최대 데미지 소스로 하여 라운드 승리

description.spanish: Gana una ronda con el daño por veneno como tu principal fuente de daño.

description.english: Win a round with bleed damage as your top damage source

description.italian: Vinci un round con il danno da vuoto come principale fonte di danno

description.english: Reduce the Lich's frost health to zero
description.french: Réduisez la santé de gel de la liche à zéro
description.german: Reduziere die Frostgesundheit des Lichs auf Null
description.italian: Riduci a zero la salute del gelo del Lich
description.japanese: リッチのフロストヘルスをゼロに減らす
description.russian: Уменьшите морозное здоровье Лича до нуля.
description.schinese: 将巫妖的冰霜生命值降低至零
description.spanish: Reduce la salud helada del Lich a cero.

description.english: Stun the Lich for at least 3 seconds in a round
description.french: Étourdissez la liche pendant au moins 3 secondes par tour
description.german: Betäube den Lich mindestens 3 Sekunden pro Runde
description.italian: Stordisci il Lich per almeno 3 secondi in un round

description.russian: Оглушите Лича минимум на 3 секунды за раунд.
description.schinese: 每轮击晕巫妖至少 3 秒
description.spanish: Aturde al Lich durante al menos 3 segundos en una ronda.

description.english: Fully nullify an attack or spell that would deal more than 100 damage
description.french: Annulez complètement une attaque ou un sort qui infligerait plus de 100 dégâts
description.german: Machen Sie einen Angriff oder Zauber, der mehr als 100 Schaden verursachen würde, vollständig zunichte
description.italian: Annulla completamente un attacco o un incantesimo che infliggerebbe più di 100 danni
description.japanese: 100以上のダメージを与える攻撃や呪文を完全に無効化する
description.koreana: 100 이상의 피해를 주는 공격이나 주문을 완전히 무효화합니다.
description.russian: Полностью аннулировать атаку или заклинание, которое нанесет более 100 урона.
description.schinese: 完全无效化造成超过 100 点伤害的攻击或法术
description.spanish: Anula completamente un ataque o hechizo que causaría más de 100 puntos de daño.
